title.#text: Mega Millions numbers: Did you win Friday's $252 million lottery jackpot?

content.#text: The Mega Millions lottery's latest jackpot has passed a quarter of a billion dollars. Here are the winning numbers in Friday's drawing: 08-16-22-66-68; Mega Ball: 11. The estimated jackpot for the drawing is $252 million. The cash option is about $153 million.

title.#text: American Axle's profit drops more than 50%

title.#text: Sharon Tal Yguado Departing Amazon as Head of Genre

content.#text: Brought in under Roy Price to oversee genre programming in a mandate from CEO Jeff Bezos, the executive wound up replacing Joe Lewis and heading drama and comedy as well before being relegated back to her original role under Jennifer Salke.
